item.description:
Let's meet a couple of potential members for dinner at Thai Paradise -- just a stone's throw from Market Square, near the Portsmouth Public Library.

**The reservation is in my name (Pam); look for the red and white Meetup sign on the table!**

Park in the metered lot between Bridge St and Maplewood Ave, or in the metered lot on the other side of Maplewood (the corner of Maplewood and Congress, behind the stores).

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group
